letters.description: Identifying the specific past life event or pattern contributing to the client's present concerns.
Guiding the client through hypnotic regression techniques to access and explore relevant past life memories.
Facilitating the client's acceptance of the past life experience and its potential impact.
Utilizing techniques like forgiveness and emotional release to clear any lingering negative energies or attachments.
Integrating the insights gained from the past life regression into the client's present life, promoting healing and empowerment.
